relproducts.title: Phoenix Burgundy (Moisture Resistant)
relproducts.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 500mm max drop: 4000mm fabric composition: 25% fibreglass / 75% pvc louvre width: 89mm & 127mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

relproducts.title: Verona Prime 25mm Titanium Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Their range of verona 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A stylish grey tone, this titanium perfect fit venetian blind adds a bold grey shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are designed for use with a upvc door and window as they are drill, and screw-free.
